item.title: [DISTRELEC-6548] SEO - Duplication Issues - Category level with only one product
item.description:
Observations :

  • This category contain only one product : http://www.distrelec.ch/en/*/c/cat-671902
  • This case happen in 26% of the categories (10k per lang, so 30k for ch) (verified by a crawl, sample),
  • A category is supposed to contain multiple products,
  • The products inside a category can fluctuate and create a "1 product category",
  • A category can be created with only one product by category managers,

Impacts :

  • UX side, it's a useless step for a user browsing the website.
  • SEO side, this create a huge amount of duplicated categories, which is killing the entire process of indexation and ranking.

Demands :

  • Redirect in 301 categories with only one product inside to this product (same process as the search results with only one results).
    Example : http://www.distrelec.ch/en/*/c/cat-671902 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/en/*/p/30011702
  • If this functionality create a blocking issue for the UX side, implement it only for robots.

Checking process :

  • Need to be verify locally by PHUBERT
  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Duplication Issues - Category level with only one product

facets.jsp

DefaultDistProductSearchFacade.java
    public void addFilterstrings(final FactFinderProductSearchPageData<SearchStateData, ProductData> searchPageData) {
        if (searchPageData != null && searchPageData.getFilters() != null && searchPageData.getFilters().size() > 0) {
            for (final FilterBadgeData<SearchStateData> filterData : searchPageData.getFilters()) {
                filterData.setFilterString("filter_" + urlEncode(filterData.getFacetCode()) + "=" + urlEncode(filterData.getFacetValueName()));

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5984] Slot for FF campaigns on Product detail page
item.description:
In order to display FF campaigns (e.g. campaign information etc) on product detail pages, we need more slots for displaying them:

The idea is to have the following:

  • A slot for displaying Feedback text (text or HTML) from Feedback campaigns above the product details; several feedback texts should be displayed if there are several campaigns for the same product
  • A slot for displaying Feedback text (text or HTML) from Feedback campaigns below the recommendation slot; several feedback texts should be displayed if there are several campaigns for the same product

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4826] Cart: Implement recommendation slots
item.description:
S.05 - No fitting product recommendations on the basket page. The user does not get stimulated to increase the basket size on this page.

Add a product recommendation campaign with fitting products to the ones that are currently in basket. The campaign should not drag the users attention away from the main call to action (Checkout), but should be visible underneath the order summary. Users could be asked to add further products from their current projects to the basket, fitting products etc.

Concept is existing from UX Roadmap 2014, only the slots to display such campaigns need to be activated.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

  • Source: FactFinder

In the roadmap 2014 the following three options have been defined:
Slot 1: Recommendations based on current products in basket
Show mix of recommendations for products which are currently in basket.
Slot 2: Shopping list and wish list products
Show products from wish list or shopping list of the user which are not currently in basket.
Slot 3: Everybody needs 
Show handpicked list of products with high margin and big interest (take-aways). Consider using different product lists for B2B/B2C customers

The second slot with a manually maintained selection is good, too (would be slot 3 in the roadmap).
